main.name: Prakash
main.description: I'm an aspiring Full-Stack Developer who builds web applications for fun! You can check out my Github Profile to see some of the interesting projects that I built
main.bio: A Full-Stack Developer who is interested in building web applications and a Cyber Security enthusiast who loves to explore and learn new technologies. I am the Treasurer of FOSS(Free-Open Source Software) and the Google Cloud Facilitator at CIT.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
